name: Shared Wrath
book: Advanced Player's Guide. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions as wrath, except that you grant multiple creatures the bonuses against your designated foe. All subjects of shared wrath receive their bonuses against the same creature.
target_zh: 最高每等级1名生物，任意两名之间的距离不得超过30尺
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同狂怒 (Wrath) 一般，不过你可以使得复数生物对抗你指定的敌人时获得加值。所有众怒的受术者会在对抗同一个生物时获得加值。
